author: C.
Cheshkov
title: Fast Hough-transform track reconstruction for the ALICE TPC
journal: Nuclear Instruments and Methods in Physics Research Section A: Accelerators, Spectrometers, Detectors and Associated Equipment
Nucl. Instrum. Methods Phys. Res., Sect. A
keywords: Hough transform, Track reconstruction, Time projection chamber, Relativistic heavy-ion reactions
abstract: A fast track-reconstruction algorithm for the Time Projection Chamber of the ALICE experiment at the LHC is presented. The algorithm is based on a “counting” Hough-transform (HT) procedure. It combines a linear Hough transformation with fast filling of the HT parameter space. Both the track-reconstruction efficiency and the time performance of the algorithm have been evaluated showing its applicability for the reconstruction of PbPb events within the framework of the ALICE High-Level Trigger.
